hero.description: The first Web3 social marketplace connecting farmers directly to consumers. Transparent blockchain tracking, AI-powered matching, and rewards for everyone.

features.title: Everything You Need to
features.subtitle: A complete ecosystem for farmers, consumers, restaurants, and distributors to connect, trade, and prosper together.
features.directMarketplaceDesc: Connect farmers directly to consumers. No middlemen, fair prices for everyone.
features.socialNetworkDesc: Build your farmer brand, share stories, go live from your farm, and grow your community.
features.blockchainTransparencyDesc: Every product tracked from farm to table. Immutable reviews and verified origins.
features.angelAIDesc: Smart matching, demand forecasting, and marketing help powered by divine intelligence.
features.reviewRewardDesc: Honest reviews build reputation. Every valuable contribution earns CAMLY tokens.
features.globalReachDesc: Sell locally or globally. Fresh products delivered faster through optimized logistics.
features.liveFromFarmDesc: Stream harvests, share your daily farming life, and build authentic connections with your customers worldwide.

howItWorks.title: FUN FARM
howItWorks.subtitle: From farm to table in just a few steps. Transparent, fair, and rewarding for everyone.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Join as a farmer, consumer, restaurant, or distributor. Verify your identity on blockchain.
howItWorks.step1Detail2: Build your reputation from day one
howItWorks.step2Desc: Farmers post fresh products. Buyers discover local and global farm-fresh goods.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Angel AI matches supply with demand. Optimal logistics for fresher delivery.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Honest reviews build trust. Every contribution earns CAMLY tokens.

earn.title: Free-Fee Platform,
earn.subtitle: No fees taken from your sales. We reward you for contributing value to the ecosystem with CAMLY tokens.
earn.joinEarnDesc: Create your profile, verify your identity, and receive a welcome bonus in CAMLY tokens.
earn.useEarnDesc: Every valuable action earns rewards: post products, share stories, write reviews, refer friends.
earn.growEarnDesc: Improve quality, build reputation, increase sales. The more you grow, the more you earn.
earn.camlyDesc: CAMLY Coin powers the FUN FARM ecosystem. Earn it, spend it, stake it. Your reputation becomes your wealth.

community.ctaDesc: Be part of a community that values truth, rewards contribution, and celebrates the people who feed the world.
